パッケージの使用
org.apache.storm.security.auth

  • org.apache.storm.drpcにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    ThriftClient 
  • org.apache.storm.hbase.securityにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    IAutoCredentials
    Provides a way to automatically push credentials to a topology and to retreave them in the worker.
    ICredentialsRenewer
    Provides a way to renew credentials on behalf of a user.
  • org.apache.storm.hdfs.common.securityにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    IAutoCredentials
    Provides a way to automatically push credentials to a topology and to retreave them in the worker.
    ICredentialsRenewer
    Provides a way to renew credentials on behalf of a user.
  • org.apache.storm.security.authにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    IAutoCredentials
    Provides a way to automatically push credentials to a topology and to retreave them in the worker.
    ICredentialsRenewer
    Provides a way to renew credentials on behalf of a user.
    IGroupMappingServiceProvider 
    IHttpCredentialsPlugin
    Interface for handling credentials in an HttpServletRequest
    IPrincipalToLocal
    Storm can be configured to launch worker processed as a given user.
    ITransportPlugin
    Interface for Thrift Transport plugin
    ReqContext
    context request context includes info about: remote address, remote subject and primary principal request ID
    ThriftConnectionType
    The purpose for which the Thrift server is created.
  • org.apache.storm.security.auth.authorizerにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    IAuthorizer
    Nimbus could be configured with an authorization plugin.
    IGroupMappingServiceProvider 
    IPrincipalToLocal
    Storm can be configured to launch worker processed as a given user.
    ReqContext
    context request context includes info about: remote address, remote subject and primary principal request ID
  • org.apache.storm.security.auth.digestにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    AbstractSaslClientCallbackHandler 
    AbstractSaslServerCallbackHandler 
    ITransportPlugin
    Interface for Thrift Transport plugin
    SaslTransportPlugin
    Base class for SASL authentication plugin.
  • org.apache.storm.security.auth.kerberosにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス 
    クラスと説明

    Provides a way to automatically push credentials to a topology and to retreave them in the worker.
    ICredentialsRenewer
    Provides a way to renew credentials on behalf of a user.

  • org.apache.storm.testingにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    ITransportPlugin
    Interface for Thrift Transport plugin
    SimpleTransportPlugin
    非推奨です。 
    Use PlainSaslTransportPlugin instead as default insecure transport plugin
  • org.apache.storm.utilsにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.security.authのクラス
